sources.title: Death Drives Through
sources.description: The race car designer Kit Woods is in love with Kay Lord. Kay's father is against her relationship with Kit. Kit also has to do with the competition from his rival Garry Ames.

metadata.Plot: The race car designer Kit Woods is in love with Kay Lord. Kay's father is against her relationship with Kit. Kit also has to do with the competition from his rival Garry Ames.
metadata.Actors: Chili Bouchier, Robert Douglas, Miles Mander
